<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Apply external data password"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/share/{key}/password"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Applies a password specified in the request to get the external data.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","description":"The unique document identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"some text"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The external data share request parameters.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"password":{"type":"string","description":"The password to share external data.","nullable":true,"example":"vfmf2vO1Kp"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The external data parameters.","title":"ExternalShareRequestParam"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"External data","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Ok","Invalid","Expired","RequiredPassword","InvalidPassword","ExternalAccessDenied"],"type":"string","description":"[Ok - Ok, Invalid - Invalid, Expired - Expired, RequiredPassword - Required password, InvalidPassword - Invalid password, ExternalAccessDenied - External access denied]","example":"Ok"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3,4,5],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Ok, 1 - Invalid, 2 - Expired, 3 - Required password, 4 - Invalid password, 5 - External access denied]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Ok","Invalid","Expired","RequiredPassword","InvalidPassword","ExternalAccessDenied"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Ok","Invalid","Expired","Required password","Invalid password","External access denied"]}],"description":"The external data status.","title":"Status"},"id":{"type":"string","description":"The external data ID.","nullable":true,"example":"9846"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The external data title.","nullable":true,"example":"legacy_1080p_small_wooden_mouse"},"tenantId":{"type":"integer","description":"The tenant ID.","format":"int32","example":1234},"entityId":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the shared entity.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"entryTitle":{"type":"string","description":"The title of the shared entry.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"shared":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to share the external data or not.","example":true},"linkId":{"type":"string","description":"The link ID of the external data.","format":"uuid","example":"75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"},"isAuthenticated":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the user is authenticated or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The external sharing information and validation data.","title":"ExternalShareDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"ExternalShareWrapper"}}}},"429":{"description":"Too many requests"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
